results.title: Adam and Eve
results.brief_description: An animated film using abstract cutouts, symbolising life, reproduction, growth and destruction from creation to the end of the world in an explosion, then the beginning of a new cycle.

results.title: Aboriginal canoe trees of the Murray
results.creator_credit: Robert Edwards, Australian Institute of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Studies and South Australian Museum
results.brief_description: First Nations people of the lower Murray River formerly made large canoes from the bark of Red Gum trees. This film documents the felling of a canoe tree from the sides of the Murray and its transportation to the South Australian Museum for preservation.

results.title: Abakanowicz in Australia
results.creator_credit: Christopher McGill, Malcolm Otton, Crafts Council of Australia and Film Australia
results.brief_description: Polish artist Magdalena Abakanowicz prepares for an exhibition of her work in Australia. We see her exhibits of large rope, hessian and string three-dimensional forms. She comments upon her intended purpose in working with such materials. Narrated by Margaret Throsby.

results.title: Fifty Years of Service
results.creator_credit: Shan Benson and State Electricity Commission of Victoria
results.brief_description: The first fifty years of the State Electricity Commission is presented by means of archival film detailing highlights of the development of the power authority for Victoria - from 1919 to the completion of the giant Hazelwood power complex.

results.title: Friends of the family
results.creator_credit: Yossi Abolafia, David Verrall, Derek Lamb and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: An animated children’s film that illustrates the different projects that UNICEF uses its funds for. Two young children suddenly find that their own comfortable home surroundings have disappeared and that they are in a very poor village that does not even have a water pump. UNICEF comes to the rescue! Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.

results.title: Ju dou
results.creator_credit: Yang Feng-Liang, Zhang Yimou, Jian Hu, Wenze Zhang, Yasuyoshi Tokuma, China Film and Takuma Shoten Publishing Company
results.brief_description: Ju Dou (Gong Li), the third wife of an impotent and abusive silk merchant Jinshan (Li Wei), finds herself seducing and ultimately falling in love with her husband’s nephew; a seemingly inevitable outcome of a loveless marriage. Jinshan’s abusive nature stems from his frustration at his wives’ inability to conceive (in reality he is sterile). Ju Dou feels this abuse when she too has trouble conceiving. Trouble develops when Ju Dou falls pregnant with her lover’s child, and an explosive situation develops as the child grows and begins to resemble the appearance of his natural father and not Jinshan. Cast includes Gong Li, Li Wei, and Li Baotian. In Mandarin with English subtitles. Banned by the Chinese Government, this film was nominated for an Academy Award for best foreign film, the first Chinese film to receive such a nomination.

results.title: The Tailor from Torzhok
results.creator_credit: Yakov Protazanov, Mezhrabpom-Russ and Valentin Turkin
results.brief_description:
A simple tailor from a rural village unexpectedly strikes it rich in Leningrad in this fast paced satirical comedy which was commissioned to publicise the state lottery. Also available on 16mm.

Credits: Director, Yakov Protazanov ; script, V. Turkin ; photography, P. Yermolov.
Cast: L. Deikun, I. Ilyinsky.

results.title: I See a dark stranger = The Adventuress
results.creator_credit: Frank Launder, Sidney Gilliat, Thelma Connell and Individual Pictures
results.brief_description: The shadowy world of German espionage in wartime Britain. Bridie Quilty has grown up in the west of Ireland under the influence of her father’s nationalism and becomes an innocent member of a German spy network. When she discovers secret plans for the D-Day landings - and falls in love with an English officer on leave - she faces her moment of truth on the Isle of Man in the climax of this atmospheric thriller. Stars Deborah Kerr, Trevor Howard and Raymond Huntley.

results.title: Northwest passage
results.creator_credit: King Vidor, Hunt Stromberg, Loew's Inc and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: An American historical drama about a group of settlers known as Rogers’ Rangers - led by Major Rogers (Spencer Tracy) - and the hardships of survival and battles with hostile Indians, they encounter in trying to settle the upper New York state area for their families in the late 1750s and early 1760s. Based on the novel “Roger’s rangers” by Kenneth Roberts. Cast includes Robert Young, Walter Brennan. Ruth Hussey.

results.title: L'invitee = the Guest
results.creator_credit: Vittorio De Seta and Jean-Roch Rognoni
results.brief_description:
When she discovers her husband has come home with a mistress, Anne leaves her home in Paris and spends the night in her office where she meets Francois, an architect. Without further ado, Francois invites her to a business trip to the South of France.

Credits: Producer, Jean-Roch Rognoni ; director, Vittorio De Seta; writers, Lucile Laks, Tonino Guerra, Frantz Andre Burguet, Vittorio De Seta, Monique Lange ; photography, Luciano Tovoli ; music, Georges Garvarentz.
Cast: Michel Piccoli, Joanna Shimkus, Jacques Perrin, Lorna Heilbron, Paul Barge, Clotilde Joanno, Jacques Rispal.
